1 A CONCURRENT RESOL UTION recog nizing Guardian
2 Ad L items and Court Appointed Special Advocates.
3 Whereas, Guardian Ad Litems (GAL) and Court Appointed
4 Special Advocates (CASA)  are members of the community who
5 give a voice to children who are victims of abuse and neglect in
6 Child in Need of Services ( CHINS)  cases in court; 
7 Whereas, GAL and CASA volunteers are specially trained
8 community members who conduct investigations and advocate
9 on behalf of children in child welfare cases. They work under
10 the guidance of trained staff advoc ates across the state to
11 ensure that each child' s best interests are represented in court; 
12 Whereas, GAL and CASA volunteers review documents, talk
13 to other professionals involved in the case, meet with the child' s
14 parents, and meet with the placement (relatives, a family friend,
15 foster parents, or other caregiver) . The volunteer then prepares
16 a summary for the court and makes an independent and
17 objective recommendation to provide fact-based information in
18 order for the court to make best interest decisions; 
19 Whereas, The Indiana State Office for GAL/CASA was
20 established in Indiana in 1990, and the state office certifies and
21 provides training and support to local GAL/CASA programs in
22 87 Indiana counties; 
23 Whereas, Indiana has one of the largest networks  of
24 GAL/CASA programs in the nation, and Hoosie r volunteers
25 spoke for 18,478 children in cases during 2023; and
